Essex Studio Artwalk

27 Feb 2013

 

 

Join me this Friday March 1st for a screen printing demo during the Essex Studio Artwalk.  I am  the guest artist of DIY Print Shop in studio 188.  There will be lots of food, printing, and (of course) art!  If you can’t make it Friday, stop by on Saturday to check out local artist Vlad Plitsyn working on some prints.
